name: The Six Roller Bandit
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 in about 48 hours

There ain't nuff room roun' here fer ya and those lil gobbos and their leader.

Time fer ya to do somt'n bout it!

Select up to 3 cards to play (You can deselect by clicking the card again)

Each card is either an "Attack" or "Defense" card

The amount of each is rolled between a specified range displayed in the card description

Enemies will display the order in which they will perform their actions, but values will be rolled after the player performs theirs.

Keep fighting till the end!

Cody Bruckerhoff - Lead Programmer

Mason Scheible - Programmer & Sound Design

Gregory Burns : Artist
